title: Latest Reading festival chevron logo
content:
Hi, first time poster but long time lurker.  
Working on an academic piece that requires the new Reading/Leeds logo however I can neither find nor work out what it is.

My guess is thats its a custom logo or possibly something cheap off Dafont by the style.

Could someone help ID it please?

Thanks.

[http://rocktransmission.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/reading-leeds-201...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831162009/http:/rocktransmission.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/reading-leeds-2013.jpg "http://rocktransmission.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/reading-leeds-2013.jpg")
